title: Math Jokes Gift Book
description: Over 100 hilarious math jokes plus an equal number of funny illustrations add up to the best math joke book for all ages . This illustrated math jokes book will be cherished by math teachers, math students and anyone who appreciates knee-slapping humor along with some mathematical groaners. As an added bonus, this is not only an illustrated joke book, but it is also a large print joke book that can be enjoyed by readers of all ages. Ralph's Math Jokes Gift Book is perfect as a : Whether you get this collection of math riddles and algebraic puns as a gift or for your own entertainment, you will be glad you chose a Ralph Lane Classic Illustrated Joke Book . It is a must for all home reading collections and for classroom libraries. If you’re looking for a teacher appreciation gift or a student motivational present, look no further than this Math Jokes Gift Book. While you’re at it, don’t forget Ralph Lane’s complete collection of Dad Joke Books and gift books for all occasions
author: Ralph Lane
